attributes.additional_details: leave the uk clock alone ,in great brittain it should start to be getting dark at 5 pm .not be like midnight at that time the center point of great brittain is  brennand farm near  dunsop bridge lancashire. i suggest at this center point of great brittain the clock is adjusted at 5 pm the sun has just gone down this needs to be done sooner then later i have been trying to change it for 15 years
